description: Zoho Invoice simplifies billing, recurring payments, and expense management, helping freelancers and small businesses send professional invoices

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVOICE_GET_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve the details of a specific item by item_id. Use when you need to fetch an item's data after confirming its existence.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVOICE_LIST_CONTACTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list contacts. Use after obtaining the organization ID to retrieve contacts with optional filters and pagination.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVOICE_LIST_EXPENSES
capabilities.description: Tool to list all expenses with optional pagination. Use when you need to retrieve expenses with simple pagination.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVOICE_LIST_INVOICES
capabilities.description: Tool to list invoices. Use when you need to retrieve all invoices with optional filters and pagination.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVOICE_LIST_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all items. Use when you need to retrieve your item catalog with optional pagination and filtering after specifying the organization ID.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVOICE_LIST_PAYMENTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list payments. Use when you need to retrieve all payments with optional filters like customer, invoice, date range, and pagination.
